text: To distort is to change the shape of something. Distortion may refer to: *Distortion (signal processing) (picture), part of signal processing *Distortion in electrical signal *Distortion, a type of musical effect that can be controlled using an effect pedal *Distortion (economics), a state where the agent does not maximize its profit or utility *Cognitive distortion, irrational thought patterns *In statistics, the bias of an estimator is sometimes called distortion *In medicine, a Strain (injury) is called distortion
title: Distortion
